DOC.brief_summary: The object study determine whether feedback add self-help protocol insomnia enhance treatment effect . In study participant receive online self-help cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) intervention consist information ( psycho-education ) sleep cognitive-behavioural exercise . Adult person insomnia invite via popular scientific website fill online questionnaire . Half participant receive e-mail therapist , half participant intervention without feedback . Participants measure 4 , 16 , 40 week intervention questionnaire .
DOC.brief_title: Online Self-Help Intervention Insomnia : With Without Feedback
DOC.criteria: Insomnia Access internet Dutch citizen Alcohol substance abuse Being suicidal Sleep apnea Schizophrenic psychosis disorder
